with the doors open on The Cybertronian Fire six tiny insect like 
creatures crawl inside seeking out Kluster.

Elsewhere on the battlefield some of the bugs hitch a ride on damaged 
Predicons.

As soon as his babies enter the CF Phobia looses contact with them. 
sitting back in his seat Phobia knowingly stares at the blank section 
of his screen, He knows that the only way to achieve peace was to 
destroy the Iron Fist, and if possible, every Predicon leader along 
with it.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, richard f allen <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod runs after Kluster. They both run to the valt.
> 
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster opens the valt, and grabs the Matrix.
> "Here Hot Rod." Kluster hands it to Hot Rod.
> He then runs back to the fight.
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> Hot Rod then runs outside, and gives the Matrix to Data.
> "Here you go, Data."
> 
> (OOOC: I was still fighting Hell Beast, when I said I would go get 
the
> Matrix, Logo. And nobody start yelling at me for using Kluster, 
Yanshosh
> told me too.)
